name: Suomen apteekkariliitto - Finlands apotekareförbund r.y.
membership: Pharmaceutical Group of the European union (PGEU), Federation of Finnish Enterprises (Yrittäjät), Finnish Federation for Social Affairs and Health (Soste), Yhteinen Toimialaliitto ry
goal:
The Association of Finnish pharmacies (AFP), founded in 1897, is a professional organization of proprietary pharmacists.

AFP supports and promotes high standards of ethical and professional competence in pharmacy services within the broader health sector. It also offers professional services, and provides training and communication services to its member pharmacies
interests: Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Social and health initiatives and policies and all other initiatives having a direct or indirect impact on pharmacies.
